headline.main: Saudi Police Colonel Is Killed and ISIS Claims Responsibility

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The colonel was shot dead near the capital of Riyadh, the latest attack in the kingdom to be claimed by the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The colonel was shot dead near the capital of Riyadh, the latest attack in the kingdom to be claimed by the Islamic State.
